patthana21.29:1.1: Nahetuṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.29:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.29:2.1_1: Nanahetuṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.29:2.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.29:3.1: Nahetuṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
